creator: Vigour Group Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Transform your health and fitness with guided Rowing workouts. Live with energy by choosing a program that hits your goal. Suitable for all fitness levels.

Get the workouts you need to meet your personal fitness target. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general fitness. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 3 days a week to improve your fitness with simple and approachable routines. Keep it simple and stay motivated. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

FEATURES

- Guided programs. Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal.
- Track your activity and make sure you keep on growing.
- Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background.
- Log your workouts, with the ability to repeat your favorites.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.

title: Rowing Machine Workout Trainer

creator: Vigour Group Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Transform your health and fitness with guided Rowing workouts. Live with energy by choosing an indoor routine that hits your goal. Great training for all fitness levels.

Get the rowing workouts you need to meet your personal targets. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general health. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 2 days a week to improve your rowing ability and technique with simple approachable routines. Use the SPM metronome to keep your stroke rate in time. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

These rowing machine workouts are perfect as a supplement to a gym or at home rowing machine such as the Concept2.

FEATURES

- Guided programs. Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal. Hit your target SPM and the rest guidance, with HIIT based training. Perfect for an indoor rowing machine.

- Track your activity to make sure you keep on growing. Use the countdown timer to improve your rowing ability and stamina.

- Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background. Use the metronome counter to match your stroke rate with your target SPM (strokes per minute).

- Log your workouts and repeat your favorites. Track average heart rate, distance and split time, with metrics to monitor your improvement over time.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.

Get the rowing workouts you need to meet your personal targets. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general health. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 2 days a week to improve your rowing ability and technique with simple approachable routines. Use the SPM metronome to keep your stroke rate in time. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

These rowing machine workouts are perfect as a supplement to a gym or at home rowing machine such as the Concept2.

FEATURES

- Guided programs. Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal. Hit your target SPM and the rest guidance, with HIIT based training. Perfect for an indoor rowing machine.

- Track your activity to make sure you keep on growing. Use the countdown timer to improve your rowing ability and stamina.

- Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background. Use the metronome counter to match your stroke rate with your target SPM (strokes per minute).

- Log your workouts and repeat your favorites. Track average heart rate, distance and split time, with metrics to monitor your improvement over time.

- Supplement your rowing workouts with our recommended exercises. Warm up and cool down effectively and build full body strength with our guided exercises.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.

Get the rowing workouts you need to meet your personal targets. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general health. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 2 days a week to improve your rowing ability and technique with simple approachable routines. Use the SPM metronome to keep your stroke rate in time. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

These rowing machine workouts are perfect as a supplement to a gym or at home rowing machine such as the Concept2.

FEATURES

- Guided programs. Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal. Hit your target SPM and the rest guidance, with HIIT based training. Perfect for an indoor rowing machine.

- Track your activity to make sure you keep on growing. Use the countdown timer to improve your rowing ability and stamina.

- Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background. Use the metronome counter to match your stroke rate with your target SPM (strokes per minute).

- Log your workouts and repeat your favorites. Track average heart rate, distance and split time, with metrics to monitor your improvement over time.

- Supplement your rowing workouts with our recommended exercises. Warm up and cool down effectively and build full body strength with our guided exercises.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.

Get the rowing workouts you need to meet your personal targets. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general health. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 2 days a week to improve your rowing ability and technique with simple approachable routines. Use the SPM metronome to keep your stroke rate in time. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

These rowing machine workouts are perfect as a supplement to a gym or on a home rowing machine including the Concept2.

ROWING FEATURES


Guided Programs
Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal. Hit your target SPM and the rest guidance, with HIIT based training. Perfect for an indoor rowing machine such as the Concept2.

Activity Tracking
Track your activity to make sure you keep on growing. Use the countdown timer to improve your rowing ability and stamina.

Personal Coach
Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background. Use the metronome counter to match your stroke rate with your target SPM (strokes per minute).

Rowing Workout Logger
Log your workouts and repeat your favorites. Track average heart rate, distance and split time, with metrics to monitor your improvement over time.

Train Safely
Supplement your rowing workouts with our recommended exercises. Warm up and cool down effectively and build full body strength with our guided exercises.

Custom Workouts
Build your very own Rowing Workout routine. Specify your duration, SPM and rest time for your workout and row along to your metronome and audio coach.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program. The app works as an ideal Concept 2 companion app but we are not in any way affiliated with Concept 2.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.

title: Rowing Machine Workouts

creator: Vigour Group Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Transform your health and fitness with guided Rowing workouts. Live with energy by choosing an indoor routine that hits your goal. Great training for all fitness levels.

Get the rowing workouts you need to meet your personal targets. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general health. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 2 days a week to improve your rowing ability and technique with simple approachable routines. Use the SPM metronome to keep your stroke rate in time. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

These rowing machine workouts are perfect as a supplement to a gym or on a home rowing machine including the Concept2.

ROWING FEATURES


Guided Programs
Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal. Hit your target SPM and the rest guidance, with HIIT based training. Perfect for an indoor rowing machine such as the Concept2.

Activity Tracking
Track your activity to make sure you keep on growing. Use the countdown timer to improve your rowing ability and stamina.

Personal Coach
Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background. Use the metronome counter to match your stroke rate with your target SPM (strokes per minute).

Rowing Workout Logger
Log your workouts and repeat your favorites. Track average heart rate, distance and split time, with metrics to monitor your improvement over time.

Train Safely
Supplement your rowing workouts with our recommended exercises. Warm up and cool down effectively and build full body strength with our guided exercises.

Custom Workouts
Build your very own Rowing Workout routine. Specify your duration, SPM and rest time for your workout and row along to your metronome and audio coach.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program. The app works as an ideal Concept 2 companion app but we are not in any way affiliated with Concept 2.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.

Get the rowing workouts you need to meet your personal targets. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general health. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 2 days a week to improve your rowing ability and technique with simple approachable routines. Use the SPM metronome to keep your stroke rate in time. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

These rowing machine workouts are perfect as a supplement to a gym or on a home rowing machine including the Concept2.

ROWING FEATURES


Guided Programs
Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal. Hit your target SPM and the rest guidance, with HIIT based training. Perfect for an indoor rowing machine such as the Concept2.

Activity Tracking
Track your activity to make sure you keep on growing. Use the countdown timer to improve your rowing ability and stamina.

Personal Coach
Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background. Use the metronome counter to match your stroke rate with your target SPM (strokes per minute).

Rowing Workout Logger
Log your workouts and repeat your favorites. Track average heart rate, distance and split time, with metrics to monitor your improvement over time.

Train Safely
Supplement your rowing workouts with our recommended exercises. Warm up and cool down effectively and build full body strength with our guided exercises.

Custom Workouts
Build your very own Rowing Workout routine. Specify your duration, SPM and rest time for your workout and row along to your metronome and audio coach.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program. The app works as an ideal Concept 2 companion app but we are not in any way affiliated with Concept 2.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.
descriptionShort: Indoor rowing machine workouts. Row for fitness, weight loss and strength!

Get the rowing workouts you need to meet your personal targets. Build muscle, lose weight or improve your general health. New to the rowing machine? Begin with our Starter Plan. Looking to lose weight? We have a weight loss plan perfect for you!

Train from just 2 days a week to improve your rowing ability and technique with simple approachable routines. Use the SPM metronome to keep your stroke rate in time. Each plan is built to help your body adapt and improve while minimising risk of injury or burn out.

These rowing machine workouts are perfect as a supplement to a gym or on a home rowing machine including the Concept2.

ROWING FEATURES


Guided Programs
Choose a plan based on your fitness level and goal. Hit your target SPM and the rest guidance, with HIIT based training. Perfect for an indoor rowing machine such as the Concept2.

Activity Tracking
Track your activity to make sure you keep on growing. Use the countdown timer to improve your rowing ability and stamina.

Personal Coach
Audio coach with support to play your own music in the background. Use the metronome counter to match your stroke rate with your target SPM (strokes per minute).

Rowing Workout Logger
Log your workouts and repeat your favorites. Track average heart rate, distance and split time, with metrics to monitor your improvement over time.

Train Safely
Supplement your rowing workouts with our recommended exercises. Warm up and cool down effectively and build full body strength with our guided exercises.

Custom Workouts
Build your very own Rowing Workout routine. Specify your duration, SPM and rest time for your workout and row along to your metronome and audio coach.

Legal Disclaimer

This app and any information given by it are for educational purposes only. They are not intended nor implied to be a substitute for professional medical advice. You should always consult your healthcare provider before beginning any fitness program. The app works as an ideal Concept 2 companion app but we are not in any way affiliated with Concept 2.

If you upgrade to a premium subscription, payment will be charged to your Google account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off in Account Settings in Play Store after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a premium subscription.

Find the full terms and conditions at https://www.vigour.fitness/terms, and our privacy policy at https://www.vigour.fitness/privacy.
